Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Davao Regional Medical and Training Center in the City of Davao to Davao Medical Center
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 319
An Act Changing the Name of the Davao Regional Medical and Training Center in the City of Davao to Davao Medical Center
Section 1. The name of the Davao Regional Medical and Training Center in the City of Davao is changed to Davao Medical Center.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: November 14, 1982
